title: relayersdao
author: relayersdao
content: Currently,crypto enter into a bear market,my token is down up,and it not the best time to buy ETH/BTC/UNI...token,i want to ask mining is okay?what's mining is better to get an income,i hope the project have income so that can give some benefit to mining users,anyone can recomand to me?

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Mining now will not give you a good profit because the valie of the token you are mining is decreasing. You will only have profit of you hold your mine tokens and sold once the price pump once again.Competition decrease during bear season since many retail miner stops mining so its really good to mine altcoins for accumulation purposes but not to have an income for the present stage.

comments.body: Quote from: relayersdao on July 13, 2022, 06:27:11 AMCurrently,crypto enter into a bear market,my token is down up,and it not the best time to buy ETH/BTC/UNI...token,i want to ask mining is okay?what's mining is better to get an income,i hope the project have income so that can give some benefit to mining users,anyone can recomand to me?Mining brings little income, the payback for ASICs and video cards is high, and when Ethereum mining ends, it will be even worse. If you have inexpensive electricity, then you might consider mining. But now there is no need to rush to buy mining equipment, because it will cost even less.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: relayersdao on July 13, 2022, 06:27:11 AMCurrently,crypto enter into a bear market,my token is down up,and it not the best time to buy ETH/BTC/UNI...token,i want to ask mining is okay?what's mining is better to get an income,i hope the project have income so that can give some benefit to mining users,anyone can recomand to me?Passive income seems to be the lure that shitcoins are using these days to get your money.  They promise massive interest on coins in order to get your money, but a 50% interest rate doesn't do much when the coin is crashing.  So many people see a yield and throw in their money without even knowing where the yield is coming from.  9 times out of 10, they're just dumping their coins on you in the form of yield while they already got your money when you bought in.  I know Bitcoin is boring because there's no yield, but eventually when you've figured out that YOU are the yield, you will smarten up and look for a strong currency instead of a big yield.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: Sure there are plenty of POW coins to mine. However go look up the profitability of most of those coins. You will find it to be awful.Just because it’s mineable doesn’t mean it’ll be profitable. The miner supply is very small and every miner wants a cut of it. And if the coin has a small market cap you are making very little. You are also competing against those that got free power and will mine pretty much anything.
